newsitem.title: USA: AmeriSource Health to buy Walker Drug.
newsitem.headline: AmeriSource Health to buy Walker Drug.

text.p: AmeriSource Health Corp said it had agreed to buy Pelham, Ala.-based pharmaceutical wholesaler Walker Drug Co for an undisclosed amount of cash.
Walker has annual revenues of $800 million and operates four distribution centers that cover 10 states in the southeastern U.S.
Amerisource said Monday the deal will be neutral to its earnings "before considering synergies." It said it expects the deal to begin adding to earnings over the next 18 months.
The deal is expected to be completed by March and is subject to customary conditions and regulatory approvals.
